name: openwriter
description: A desktop app with multi prebuilt features
author: Harald Bregu <harald.bregu@gmail.com>
copyright: Â© 2026 OpenWriter Project. All rights reserved.

scripts.dev-linux:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 electron-vite dev --mode staging
scripts.dev-linux:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_DISABLE_SANDBOX=1 electron-vite dev --mode production
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn typecheck && electron-vite build
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn typecheck && electron-vite build --mode development
scripts.build:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging yarn typecheck && electron-vite build --mode staging
scripts.dist:win:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn build:dev && electron-builder --win --x64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs windows dev
scripts.dist:win:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging yarn build:staging && electron-builder --win --x64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs windows stg
scripts.dist:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && yarn build && electron-builder --mac pkg --x64 && electron-builder --mac pkg --arm64
scripts.dist:mac:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ./scripts/fix-mac-build.sh && yarn build:dev && electron-builder --mac pkg --x64 && electron-builder --mac pkg --arm64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs macos dev
scripts.dist:mac:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging ./scripts/fix-mac-build.sh && yarn build:staging && electron-builder --mac pkg --x64 && electron-builder --mac pkg --arm64 && node scripts/package-build.cjs macos stg
scripts.dist:mac:dmg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build && electron-builder --mac dmg --x64 && electron-builder --mac dmg --arm64
scripts.dist:mac:dmg:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ./scripts/fix-mac-build.sh && yarn build:dev && electron-builder --mac dmg --x64 && electron-builder --mac dmg --arm64
scripts.dist:mac:dmg:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging ./scripts/fix-mac-build.sh && yarn build:staging && electron-builder --mac dmg --x64 && electron-builder --mac dmg --arm64
scripts.dist:linux:appimage: cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn build && electron-builder --linux AppImage
scripts.clean: rimraf dist out && rimraf node_modules/.cache/electron && rimraf node_modules/.cache/electron-builder
